title: How to further develop my band - Quora

response.answer_text: Everyone should always be a student. Look at your craft as a never ending cycle of improvement. Every member should be training to be better. Your goal is to be better than you were a month ago, a year ago, 5years ago etc. Write write write. You cant write amazing songs all the time until you write a whole bunch of shitty ones. It's basically the 10,000 hour theory. You can't be the best at what you do until you've put 10,000 hours into it. Everything. Writing, training, performance,soloing whatever. Do work.
